===Origin===
After the [[Superhuman Registration Act]] was cancelled, [[Emery Schaub (Earth-616)|Butterball (Emery Schaub)]] came back to his town along his friend [[James Santini (Earth-616)|Batwing (Jimmy Santini)]], [[Morganton]], [[North Carolina (State)|North Carolina]], along with his friend and teammate to form a new North Carolina team to replace the disgraced [[U-Foes (Earth-616)|U-Foes]].{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #35}}<ref name="HeroicAgeBatwing">{{cl|Heroic Age: Heroes #1}}; [[James Santini (Earth-616)|Batwing]]'s entry</ref>{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A-Z Update #3|; [[Emery Schaub (Earth-616)|Butterball]]'s entry}}

===[[Fear Itself]] & [[Avengers Academy (Earth-616)|Avengers Academy]]===
The duo presented themselves at [[Washington, D.C.]] to join [[Richard Gilmore (Earth-616)|Prodigy]]'s [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|Initiative]],{{r|Fear Itself: Youth in Revolt #1}} and in the [[Shattered Heroes|aftermaths]], they joined the [[Avengers Academy (Earth-616)|Avengers Academy]] at their new [[Avengers Compound|headquarters]],{{r|Avengers Academy #20}} as part-time students.{{r|Avengers Academy #21}} They didn't presented themselves as a team.
